content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully built on the map. The agent made repeated attempts to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) and to craft or place one, but these efforts failed because the Lab item was not available in the inventory and the required sub‐components could not be produced. Although resource‐processing steps were undertaken using furnaces (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)), these were retrieved from existing game elements rather than newly constructed.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Errors – When calling get_entities, use the correct signature. Verify that no unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments are supplied.
• Lab Placement Without Inventory – Ensure that the Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting to place it at (0.5, 2.5).
• NoneType Iteration – Before iterating over the results from functions like get_entities, check that a valid, non‐None list is returned (e.g., default to an empty list if necessary).
• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages – Confirm that the entire supply chain for Lab components is met. This includes having sufficient iron plates (to produce iron-gear-wheels) and copper plates (for copper-cables and electronic circuits) so that all sub-ingredient requirements for crafting a Lab are fulfilled.
